The CEO outlined Chrysler's commitment to CNG development, stating: In the United States, there is a substantial domestic supply of CNG. CNG technology is readily available without extensive development time or expenditure of resources. Fiat already has a portfolio of CNG engines, both naturally aspirated and turbocharged. Andy Coulson , the former editor of the News of the World, stood down after a series of new revelations about illegal phone-hacking during his time at the tabloid. The Prime Minister's spokesman said: He had finished what he wanted to finish and good progress is being made with his replacement.`` It was his choice to leave quietly but he said a proper goodbye to the prime minister and those he worked closely with. Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 when its royal editor, Clive Goodman , was jailed for conspiracy to access phone messages.
